testcase.name: getAllProducts

failure.message: JSON documents are different: Different value found in node "$.products[4].description", expected: <"Huaweiâ€™s re-badged P30 Pro New Edition was officially unveiled yesterday in Germany and now the device has made its way to the UK."> but was: <"Huawei’s re-badged P30 Pro New Edition was officially unveiled yesterday in Germany and now the device has made its way to the UK.">.
